Package sampler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BootstrapSampler
    Generates bootstrap samples from an original set S of indices.
    FullSetSampler
    Trivial sampler that always returns a copy of the full set of indices.
    RandomSampler
    Generic definition of a random sampler
    SubsetSampler
    Generates bootstrap samples from an original set S of indices.
